snippet: The center-left’s official candidate, Franco Marini, a former union leader and president of the Senate, was unable to get the two-thirds majority required.
lead_paragraph: The center-left’s official candidate, Franco Marini, a former union leader and president of the Senate, was unable to get the two-thirds majority required.

headline.seo: Italian Lawmakers Fail to Elect a President
headline.main: Italian Lawmakers Fail to Elect a President
